mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_CARR_HW_1X_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.LOCAL_CELL_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID||'.'||V1.carr_seq AS "载扇标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "载扇所属MSC标识",'' "载扇所属MGW标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME AS "载扇所属BSC标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "载扇所属BTS标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.LOCAL_CELL_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "载扇所属扇区标识", ne.CHINA_NAME "载扇所属扇区名称",V1.CARR_SEQ "载波编号", to_char(V11.PLTCHGAIN) AS "MP1.5.1.1.1", to_char(V20.PCHGAIN) AS "MP1.5.1.1.2", to_char(V21.SYNCHGAIN) AS "MP1.5.1.1.3", to_char(V17.MAXCELLR) AS "MP1.5.1.1.4", to_char(V1.ACHLOWTHR) AS "MP1.5.1.1.5", to_char(V15.TOTALZN) AS "MP1.5.1.2.1", to_char(V15.ZNTMR) AS "MP1.5.1.2.2", to_char(V15.MSID) AS "MP1.5.1.2.3", to_char(V15.MNID) AS "MP1.5.1.2.4", to_char(V15.MAXTSPRDIDX) AS "MP1.5.1.2.5", to_char(V15.HOMEREG) AS "MP1.5.1.2.6", to_char(V15.FORSIDREG) AS "MP1.5.1.2.7", to_char(V15.FORNIDREG) AS "MP1.5.1.2.8", to_char(V15.PWRUP) AS "MP1.5.1.2.9", to_char(V15.PWRDWN) AS "MP1.5.1.2.10", to_char(V15.PRMREG) AS "MP1.5.1.2.11", to_char(V15.REGPRD) AS "MP1.5.1.2.12", to_char(V15.REGDIST) AS "MP1.5.1.2.13", to_char(V4.BCIDX) AS "MP1.5.1.2.14", to_char(V20.ADDNUM) AS "MP1.5.1.2.15", to_char(V10.PLTPL) AS "MP1.5.1.3.1", to_char(V20.ACHNUM) AS "MP1.5.1.3.2", to_char(V18.MAXLEN) AS "MP1.5.1.3.3", to_char(V18.PAMLEN) AS "MP1.5.1.3.4", to_char(V19.NOMPWR) AS "MP1.5.1.3.5", to_char(V19.INITPWR) AS "MP1.5.1.3.6", to_char(V19.PWRCSTEP) AS "MP1.5.1.3.7", to_char(V19.NUMSTEP) AS "MP1.5.1.3.8", to_char(V19.PRBPNRAN) AS "MP1.5.1.3.9", to_char(V19.PRBBKOFF) AS "MP1.5.1.3.10", to_char(V19.BKOFF) AS "MP1.5.1.3.11", to_char(V19.MAXREQSEQ) AS "MP1.5.1.3.12", to_char(V19.MAXRSPSEQ) AS "MP1.5.1.3.13", to_char(V10.TXGAIN) AS "MP1.5.1.4.1", to_char(V10.SCTGAIN) AS "MP1.5.1.4.2", to_char(V5.FWDVCFCHFER1) AS "MP1.5.1.4.3", to_char(V5.FWDDATFCHFER1) AS "MP1.5.1.4.4", to_char(V6.IS95SCHGAIN1) AS "MP1.5.1.4.5", to_char(V6.IS95SCHGAIN2) AS "MP1.5.1.4.6", to_char(V6.IS95SCHGAIN3) AS "MP1.5.1.4.7", to_char(V6.IS2KSCHGAIN1) AS "MP1.5.1.4.8", to_char(V6.IS2KSCHGAIN2) AS "MP1.5.1.4.9", to_char(V6.IS2KSCHGAIN3) AS "MP1.5.1.4.10", to_char(V6.VINITFCH) AS "MP1.5.1.4.11", to_char(V6.VMAXFCH) AS "MP1.5.1.4.12", to_char(V6.VMINFCH) AS "MP1.5.1.4.13", to_char(V6.DINITFCH) AS "MP1.5.1.4.14", to_char(V6.DMAXFCH) AS "MP1.5.1.4.15", to_char(V6.DMINFCH) AS "MP1.5.1.4.16", to_char(V6.MAXDCCH) AS "MP1.5.1.4.17", to_char(V6.MINDCCH) AS "MP1.5.1.4.18", to_char(V6.SCHMAX) AS "MP1.5.1.4.19", to_char(V6.SCHMIN) AS "MP1.5.1.4.20", to_char(V6.V6VUFPCM) AS "MP1.5.1.4.21", to_char(V6.V6DUFPCM) AS "MP1.5.1.4.22", to_char(V6.V7VUFPCM) AS "MP1.5.1.4.23", to_char(V6.V7DUFPCM) AS "MP1.5.1.4.24", to_char(V6.FPCTHRS) AS "MP1.5.1.4.25", to_char(V7.PWRRPTTHRS) AS "MP1.5.1.4.26", to_char(V7.PWRRPTFRMNUM) AS "MP1.5.1.4.27", to_char(V7.PWRRPTDL) AS "MP1.5.1.4.28", to_char(V13.REVSPDMDLOADCTRLSW) AS "MP1.5.1.4.29", to_char(V12.REVPWRCSTEP) AS "MP1.5.1.4.30", to_char(V12.VFCHRLGAINADJ) AS "MP1.5.1.4.31", to_char(V12.DFCHRLGAINADJ) AS "MP1.5.1.4.32", to_char(V12.RLGAINSCHPLT1X) AS "MP1.5.1.4.33", to_char(V12.RLGAINSCHPLT2X) AS "MP1.5.1.4.34", to_char(V12.RLGAINSCHPLT4X) AS "MP1.5.1.4.35", to_char(V12.RLGAINSCHPLT8X) AS "MP1.5.1.4.36", to_char(V12.RLGAINSCHPLT16X) AS "MP1.5.1.4.37", to_char(V12.RLGAINSCHPLT32X) AS "MP1.5.1.4.38", to_char(V12.REVPWRCTRLDELAY) AS "MP1.5.1.4.39", to_char(V9.SRCHWINA) AS "MP1.5.1.5.1", to_char(V9.SRCHWINN) AS "MP1.5.1.5.2", to_char(V9.SRCHWINR) AS "MP1.5.1.5.3", to_char(V9.NBRMAXAGE) AS "MP1.5.1.5.4", to_char(V9.TADD) AS "MP1.5.1.5.5", to_char(V9.TDROP) AS "MP1.5.1.5.6", to_char(V9.TTDROP) AS "MP1.5.1.5.7", to_char(V9.ADDINTERC) AS "MP1.5.1.5.8", to_char(V9.DROPINTERC) AS "MP1.5.1.5.9", to_char(V9.SOFTSLOPE) AS "MP1.5.1.5.10", to_char(V9.TCMP) AS "MP1.5.1.5.11", to_char(V9.PNINC) AS "MP1.5.1.5.12", to_char(V19.ACCTMO) AS "MP1.5.1.5.13", to_char(V14.R1XDRT) AS "MP1.5.1.7.1", to_char(V14.R2XDRT) AS "MP1.5.1.7.2", to_char(V14.R4XDRT) AS "MP1.5.1.7.3", to_char(V14.R8XDRT) AS "MP1.5.1.7.4", to_char(V14.R16XDRT) AS "MP1.5.1.7.5", to_char(V14.R32XDRT) AS "MP1.5.1.7.6", to_char(V14.FWDMINDRT) AS "MP1.5.1.7.7", to_char(V14.FWDMAXDRT) AS "MP1.5.1.7.8", to_char(V10.OBNDCLS) AS "MP1.5.1.8.1", to_char(V2.RCDATASCHSW) AS "MP1.5.1.8.2", to_char(V8.BNDCLS) AS "MP1.5.1.8.3", to_char(V3.BNDCLS) AS "MP1.5.1.8.4", to_char(V16.BNDCLS) AS "MP1.5.1.8.5", to_char(V10.AUTODWNCDMACH) AS "MP1.5.1.9.1", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_ALDCTRL_HW V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.RELATED_CELL) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_CHINF_HW V2 on (V1.NE_SYS_ID = V2.NE_SYS_ID AND V1.STAMPTIME = V2.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_EGSRDM_HW V3 on (V2.NE_SYS_ID = V3.NE_SYS_ID AND V2.STAMPTIME = V3.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_ESPM_HW V4 on (V3.NE_SYS_ID = V4.NE_SYS_ID AND V3.STAMPTIME = V4.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_FER_HW V5 on (V4.NE_SYS_ID = V5.NE_SYS_ID AND V4.STAMPTIME = V5.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_FFASTPC_HW V6 on (V5.NE_SYS_ID = V6.NE_SYS_ID AND V5.STAMPTIME = V6.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_FSLOWPC_HW V7 on (V6.NE_SYS_ID = V7.NE_SYS_ID AND V6.STAMPTIME = V7.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_GSRDM_HW V8 on (V7.NE_SYS_ID = V8.NE_SYS_ID AND V7.STAMPTIME = V8.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_HO_HW V9 on (V8.NE_SYS_ID = V9.NE_SYS_ID AND V8.STAMPTIME = V9.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_HW V10 on (V9.NE_SYS_ID = V10.NE_SYS_ID AND V9.STAMPTIME = V10.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_PLTCH_HW V11 on (V10.NE_SYS_ID = V11.NE_SYS_ID AND V10.STAMPTIME = V11.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_RCLPC_HW V12 on (V11.NE_SYS_ID = V12.NE_SYS_ID AND V11.STAMPTIME = V12.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_RLDCTRL_HW V13 on (V12.NE_SYS_ID = V13.NE_SYS_ID AND V12.STAMPTIME = V13.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_SCH_HW V14 on (V13.NE_SYS_ID = V14.NE_SYS_ID AND V13.STAMPTIME = V14.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_SPM_HW V15 on (V14.NE_SYS_ID = V15.NE_SYS_ID AND V14.STAMPTIME = V15.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_CDMA1XCH_SRCFG_HW V16 on (V15.NE_SYS_ID = V16.NE_SYS_ID AND V15.STAMPTIME = V16.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_HW_CBTSSECTORCARRIER_1X V17 on (V16.NE_SYS_ID = V17.NE_SYS_ID AND V16.STAMPTIME = V17.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_PCH_ACH_HW V18 on (V17.NE_SYS_ID = V18.NE_SYS_ID AND V17.STAMPTIME = V18.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_PCH_APM_HW V19 on (V18.NE_SYS_ID = V19.NE_SYS_ID AND V18.STAMPTIME = V19.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_PCH_HW V20 on (V19.NE_SYS_ID = V20.NE_SYS_ID AND V19.STAMPTIME = V20.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_SYNCH_HW V21 on (V20.NE_SYS_ID = V21.NE_SYS_ID AND V20.STAMPTIME = V21.STAMPTIME) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0808' AND V1.BUSTYPE = '1X'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_CARR_HW_DO_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.LOCAL_CELL_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID||'.'||V1.carr_seq AS "载扇标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "载扇所属MSC标识",'' "载扇所属MGW标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME AS "载扇所属BSC标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "载扇所属BTS标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.LOCAL_CELL_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "载扇所属扇区标识", ne.CHINA_NAME "载扇所属扇区名称",V1.CARR_SEQ "载波编号", to_char(V6.CAPSULEOFFSET) AS "MP1.5.2.1.1", to_char(V6.CCHRATE) AS "MP1.5.2.1.2", to_char(V2.PLTPL) AS "MP1.5.2.3.1", to_char(V4.ACYCLEDURATION) AS "MP1.5.2.3.2", to_char(V4.PRBNUMSTEP) AS "MP1.5.2.3.3", to_char(V4.PRBLEN) AS "MP1.5.2.3.4", to_char(V4.CAPSULELENMAX) AS "MP1.5.2.3.5", to_char(V4.SECTORACCMAXRATE) AS "MP1.5.2.3.6", to_char(V3.MAXCELLR) AS "MP1.5.2.3.7", to_char(V2.TXGAIN) AS "MP1.5.2.4.1", to_char(V2.SCTGAIN) AS "MP1.5.2.4.2", to_char(V4.OLOOPADJUST) AS "MP1.5.2.4.3", to_char(V4.PRBINIADJUST) AS "MP1.5.2.4.4", to_char(V4.PWRSTEP) AS "MP1.5.2.4.5", to_char(V8.MINPCT) AS "MP1.5.2.4.6", to_char(V8.MAXPCT) AS "MP1.5.2.4.7", to_char(V8.INITPCT) AS "MP1.5.2.4.8", to_char(V8.NORMALGFRAMED) AS "MP1.5.2.4.9", to_char(V8.NODATAMAXINC) AS "MP1.5.2.4.10", to_char(V5.DOAREVPER) AS "MP1.5.2.4.11", to_char(V7.SOFTSLOPE) AS "MP1.5.2.5.1", to_char(V7.ADDINTERCEPT) AS "MP1.5.2.5.2", to_char(V7.DROPINTERCEPT) AS "MP1.5.2.5.3", to_char(V7.NBRMAXAGE) AS "MP1.5.2.5.4", to_char(V7.DIFFCHNBRMAXAGE) AS "MP1.5.2.5.5", to_char(V7.SRCHWINA) AS "MP1.5.2.5.6", to_char(V7.SRCHWINN) AS "MP1.5.2.5.7", to_char(V7.SRCHWINR) AS "MP1.5.2.5.8", to_char(V2.OBNDCLS) AS "MP1.5.2.8.1", to_char(V2.AUTODWNCDMACH) AS "MP1.5.2.9.1", to_char(V1.RABOFFSET) AS "MP1.5.2.20.1", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_CDMADOCH_DOSP_HW V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.RELATED_CELL) inner join PARA_CDMADOCH_HW V2 on (V1.NE_SYS_ID = V2.NE_SYS_ID AND V1.STAMPTIME = V2.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_HW_CBTSSECTORCARRIER_DO V3 on (V2.NE_SYS_ID = V3.NE_SYS_ID AND V2.STAMPTIME = V3.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_HW_DOAPM V4 on (V3.NE_SYS_ID = V4.NE_SYS_ID AND V3.STAMPTIME = V4.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_HW_DOARPCP V5 on (V4.NE_SYS_ID = V5.NE_SYS_ID AND V4.STAMPTIME = V5.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_HW_DOCCHP V6 on (V5.NE_SYS_ID = V6.NE_SYS_ID AND V5.STAMPTIME = V6.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_HW_DOCNP V7 on (V6.NE_SYS_ID = V7.NE_SYS_ID AND V6.STAMPTIME = V7.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_HW_DORPCP V8 on (V7.NE_SYS_ID = V8.NE_SYS_ID AND V7.STAMPTIME = V8.STAMPTIME) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0808' AND V1.BUSTYPE = 'DO'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_CARR_ZTE_1X_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID||'.'||V1.carr_seq AS "载扇标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "载扇所属MSC标识",'' "载扇所属MGW标识", NE.BSC_NAME AS "载扇所属BSC标识", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "载扇所属BTS标识", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "载扇所属扇区标识", ne.CHINA_NAME "载扇所属扇区名称",V1.CARR_SEQ "载波编号", to_char(V1.INIT_PWR) AS "MP2.5.1.3.1", to_char(V1.PWR_STEP) AS "MP2.5.1.3.2", to_char(V1.NUM_STEP) AS "MP2.5.1.3.3", to_char(V1.MAX_CAP_SZ) AS "MP2.5.1.3.4", to_char(V1.PAM_SZ) AS "MP2.5.1.3.5", to_char(V1.PROBE_PN_RAN) AS "MP2.5.1.3.6", to_char(V1.ACC_TMO) AS "MP2.5.1.3.7", to_char(V1.PROBE_BKOFF) AS "MP2.5.1.3.8", to_char(V1.BKOFF) AS "MP2.5.1.3.9", to_char(V1.MAX_REQ_SEQ) AS "MP2.5.1.3.10", to_char(V1.MAX_RSP_SEQ) AS "MP2.5.1.3.11", to_char(V2.NOM_PWR) AS "MP2.5.1.3.12", to_char(V4.FPC_MODE) AS "MP2.5.1.4.1", to_char(V4.FPC_MODE_SCH) AS "MP2.5.1.4.2", to_char(V4.FPC_PRI_CHAN) AS "MP2.5.1.4.3", to_char(V4.FPC_FCH_FER_VOICE) AS "MP2.5.1.4.4", to_char(V4.FPC_FCH_FER_DATA) AS "MP2.5.1.4.5", to_char(V4.FPCFCHMINSETPVOICE) AS "MP2.5.1.4.6", to_char(V4.FPCFCHMINSETPDATA) AS "MP2.5.1.4.7", to_char(V4.FPCFCHMAXSETPVOICE) AS "MP2.5.1.4.8", to_char(V4.FPCFCHMAXSETPDATA) AS "MP2.5.1.4.9", to_char(V4.FPC_DCCH_FER) AS "MP2.5.1.4.10", to_char(V4.FPC_DCCH_MAX_SETPT) AS "MP2.5.1.4.11", to_char(V4.FPC_SEC_CHAN) AS "MP2.5.1.4.12", to_char(V4.FPCFCHINITSETPVOICE) AS "MP2.5.1.4.13", to_char(V4.FPCFCHINITSETPDATA) AS "MP2.5.1.4.14", to_char(V4.RLGAIN_ADJ) AS "MP2.5.1.4.15", to_char(V4.REV_FCH_GATING_MODE) AS "MP2.5.1.4.16", to_char(V4.FPC_SCH_INIT_SETPT) AS "MP2.5.1.4.17", to_char(V4.FPC_SCH_MIN_SETPT) AS "MP2.5.1.4.18", to_char(V4.FPC_SCH_MAX_SETPT) AS "MP2.5.1.4.19", to_char(V4.FPC_SETPT_THRESH_SCH) AS "MP2.5.1.4.20", to_char(V4.FPC_SCH_FER32X) AS "MP2.5.1.4.21", to_char(V4.FPC_SCH_FER16X) AS "MP2.5.1.4.22", to_char(V4.FPC_SCH_FER8X) AS "MP2.5.1.4.23", to_char(V4.FPC_SCH_FER4X) AS "MP2.5.1.4.24", to_char(V4.FPC_SCH_FER2X) AS "MP2.5.1.4.25", to_char(V4.FPC_SCH_INIT_SETPT_OP) AS "MP2.5.1.7.1", to_char(V3.REVDTXDURATION) AS "MP2.5.1.7.2", to_char(V3.FWDSCHRCPREF) AS "MP2.5.1.8.1", to_char(V3.FWDCODINGTYPE) AS "MP2.5.1.8.2", to_char(V3.FWDSCHMAXRATE) AS "MP2.5.1.8.3", to_char(V3.REVSCHRCPREF) AS "MP2.5.1.8.4", to_char(V3.REVCODINGTYPE) AS "MP2.5.1.8.5", to_char(V3.REVSCHMAXRATE) AS "MP2.5.1.8.6", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_R_3G_T_ACCESS_PARA_ZTE V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.RELATED_CELL) inner join PARA_R_3G_T_CARRIER_ZTE V2 on (V1.NE_SYS_ID = V2.NE_SYS_ID AND V1.STAMPTIME = V2.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_R_3G_T_CH_PARA_ZTE V3 on (V2.NE_SYS_ID = V3.NE_SYS_ID AND V2.STAMPTIME = V3.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_ZTE_R_3G_T_PC_MSG V4 on (V3.NE_SYS_ID = V4.NE_SYS_ID AND V3.STAMPTIME = V4.STAMPTIME) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0804' AND V1.BUSTYPE = '1X'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_CARR_ZTE_DO_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID||'.'||V1.carr_seq AS "载扇标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN as "载扇所属MSC标识",'' "载扇所属MGW标识", NE.BSC_NAME AS "载扇所属BSC标识", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "载扇所属BTS标识", NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "载扇所属扇区标识", ne.CHINA_NAME "载扇所属扇区名称",V1.CARR_SEQ "载波编号", to_char(V4.OLCONTROLMINDORM) AS "MP2.5.2.1.1", to_char(V2.RABLENGTH) AS "MP2.5.2.1.2", to_char(V3.SYNCCAPSULEOFFSET) AS "MP2.5.2.1.3", to_char(V3.CONTROLCHANNELRATE) AS "MP2.5.2.1.4", to_char(V1.PROBENUMSTEP) AS "MP2.5.2.3.1", to_char(V1.ACHDURATIONFOR6800) AS "MP2.5.2.3.2", to_char(V1.SECTORACCESSMAXRATE) AS "MP2.5.2.3.3", to_char(V1.OPENLOOPADJUST) AS "MP2.5.2.4.1", to_char(V1.POWERSTEP) AS "MP2.5.2.4.2", to_char(V2.RABOFFSET) AS "MP2.5.2.20.1", to_char(V2.RABTHRESHOLD68_ROT) AS "MP2.5.2.20.2", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_R_H_T_ACC_PARA_ZTE V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.RELATED_CELL) inner join PARA_R_H_T_CARRIER_STATE_ZTE V2 on (V1.NE_SYS_ID = V2.NE_SYS_ID AND V1.STAMPTIME = V2.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_R_H_T_CCH_PARA_ZTE V3 on (V2.NE_SYS_ID = V3.NE_SYS_ID AND V2.STAMPTIME = V3.STAMPTIME) inner join PARA_R_H_T_OVLD_PARA_ZTE V4 on (V3.NE_SYS_ID = V4.NE_SYS_ID AND V3.STAMPTIME = V4.STAMPTIME) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0804' AND V1.BUSTYPE = 'DO'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_CARR_ALU_1X_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID||'.'||V1.carr_seq AS "载扇标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",case ne.CITY_NAME when '江汉' then ne.COUNTY_NAME else ne.CITY_NAME end as "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "载扇所属MSC标识",'' "载扇所属MGW标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID AS "载扇所属BSC标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID AS "载扇所属BTS标识", NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID AS "载扇所属扇区标识", ne.CHINA_NAME "载扇所属扇区名称",V1.CARR_SEQ "载波编号", to_char(V1.BCAST_INDEX) AS "MP4.5.1.2.1", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join (SELECT C.NE_SYS_ID,C.RELATED_CELL,C.BTS_ID,C.SECTOR_ID,C.LOCAL_CELL_ID,C.carr_seq,C.BUSTYPE,C.VENDOR,CLT.BCAST_INDEX,CLT.STAMPTIME FROM NE_CARRIER_C C,CLT_CM_LUC_ECP CLT where C.OMC_ID=CLT.OMCID AND C.VENDOR='ZY0810' AND TRUNC(CLT.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD')) V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.RELATED_CELL) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0810' AND V1.BUSTYPE = '1X'

mapping.name: ${province_en}_PARA_CARR_ALU_DO_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.sql: select to_char(V1.STAMPTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "时间戳", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.LOCAL_CELL_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID||'.'||V1.carr_seq when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID||'.'||V1.carr_seq WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID||'.'||V1.carr_seq END AS "载扇标识", '${province_cn}' "省份",ne.CITY_NAME "城市", ne.MSC_SIGN "载扇所属MSC标识",'' "载扇所属MGW标识", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.BSC_NAME END AS "载扇所属BSC标识", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID END AS "载扇所属BTS标识", case NE.VENDOR when 'ZY0808' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.LOCAL_CELL_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID when 'ZY0810' THEN NE.MSC_SIGN || '.' || NE.BSC_ID || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN NE.BSC_NAME || '.' || NE.BTS_ID ||'.'|| V1.SECTOR_ID END AS "载扇所属扇区标识", ne.CHINA_NAME "载扇所属扇区名称",V1.CARR_SEQ "载波编号", to_char(V1.PREAMBLELENGTHSLOTS) AS "MP4.5.2.3.1", to_char(V1.SECTORACCESSMAXRATE) AS "MP4.5.2.3.2", '' "#" FROM (select CELL.*,MSC.MSC_NAME AS MSC_SIGN from NE_CELL_C CELL, (select a.RELATED_MSC, replace(wmsys.wm_concat(distinct case when b.CITY_NAME = '江汉' then 'XT,TM,QJ' else b.ENNAME end), ',', '|') ||'_'||a.MSC_NAME as MSC_NAME from ne_bsc_c a, cfg_city b where a.city_id = b.city_id GROUP BY a.RELATED_MSC,a.MSC_NAME) MSC where CELL.RELATED_MSC = MSC.RELATED_MSC) NE inner join PARA_LUC_DO_SECTORCARRIER V1 ON (NE.NE_SYS_ID = V1.RELATED_CELL) WHERE TRUNC(V1.STAMPTIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND V1.VENDOR = 'ZY0810' AND V1.BUSTYPE = 'DO'
